quizzes.title: Literature Quiz: Harry Potter and Book
quizzes.description: Test your literature knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Literature, people, mirror. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: It is mentioned in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows that Bill had a real knack for guessing the passwords for the radio.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Who does Hermione Granger fly with when leaving Privet Drive?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kingsley Shacklebolt

questions.question: On what day did Harry Potter discover the Mirror of Erised?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: December 25th

questions.question: Was Albus Dumbledores sister named Areida?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: How many people died in the book Harry Potter and the Sorcerers Stone?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 3

questions.question: What is Harrys first line in the book Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: What the?

questions.question: What character first discovered that the name Voldemort was cursed?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ron

questions.question: Fictional character Rita Skeeter wrote a book titled Albus Dumbledore, His Life and Lies.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: According to the Harry Potter books, Fleur Delacours middle name is Clemence.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What spell does Hermione not approve of according to the book Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Muffliato

questions.question: What is the name of the spell that multiplies objects in the Harry Potter books?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Gemino

questions.question: In Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows, Ron leaves the group when they are in the forest of Dean.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: On what floor of the fictional Hogwarts school do you find the Room of Requirement?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 7th

questions.question: In the chapter of Harry Potter and the Deadly Hallows, titled The Princes Tale, Lily states that these two boys idea of humor is, just evil.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mulciber and Avery

questions.question: Who does Harry first use the Imperius curse on in Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A goblin

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Aurora and Sleeping Beauty
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, fairies, maleficent. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the movie Sleeping Beauty, back at home in the castle, Aurora finds a spinning wheel in the castles tower, pricks her finger on the spindle and falls into a deep sleep. Who finds Aurora?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The fairies

questions.question: In the popular Disney animated film Maleficent curses baby Aurora: she will die when she pricks her finger on a spinning wheels spindle.  Why does Maleficent arrive and curse the child?

options.text: She was in line to inherit the kingdom before Aurora was born.
She is in love with the king.
She hates the queen, her sister.
She was not invited to the christening.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She was not invited to the christening.

questions.question: Sleeping Beautys musical score and songs were inspired by Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovskys Sleeping Beauty ballet.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: In the animated movie Sleeping Beauty, just prior to Auroras 16th birthday, Maleficent is furious that she and her evil henchmen still cannot find Aurora. What does Maleficent do?

options.text: She consults her crystal ball for Aurora.
She sends out her raven Diablo to find Aurora.
She disguises herself as a peasant and searches for Aurora.
She puts the prince under a spell and sends him to search for Aurora.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She sends out her raven Diablo to find Aurora.

questions.question: In the movie Sleeping Beauty, on Auroras 16th birthday, the fairies decide to make two presents, but their attempts fail and they use their wands, thus giving away their location. What two items were the fairies making for Aurora?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A cake and a gown

questions.question: What is the gift of the third fairy in the Disney movie Sleeping Beauty?

options.text: She makes Aurora able to live for 500 years.
She weakens the curse so Aurora will only fall into a deep sleep.
She makes a valiant prince fall in love with Aurora.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She weakens the curse so Aurora will only fall into a deep sleep.

questions.question: The three fairies in the animated film Sleeping Beauty decide to conceal Aurora in a cabin in the woods until her 16th birthday passes, but before the fairies take Aurora to the woods, what does the King do to stop the curse?

options.text: tries to have another witch remove the curse
commands all spinning wheels be destroyed

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: commands all spinning wheels be destroyed

questions.question: In the Disney movie Sleeping Beauty, Princess Aurora is born to King Stefan and Queen Leah and they name her Aurora after what Roman goddess?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The goddess of the dawn

questions.question: In the Disney film Sleeping Beauty, the fairies find out that Prince Phillip is the man Aurora loves and the only one who can break the spell, but Maleficents henchmen capture him and take him to Maleficents castle. What is the castle called?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Forbidden Mountain

questions.question: What do the fairies rename Aurora in the Disney movie Sleeping Beauty?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Briar Rose

questions.question: Does Voldemort tell Neville that he has spirit and bravery in the last book of the Harry Potter series?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: In the Disney movie Sleeping Beauty, once Aurora falls into her deep sleep, the fairies freeze time until the spell is broken.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: In the Disney movie Sleeping Beauty, when Aurora returns to the cabin, the fairies tell her who she really is and take her to the castle to see her parents.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Sleeping Beauty was the last fairy tale produced by Walt Disney.  When was it released?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: January 29, 1959

questions.question: What characters screams at the end of Harry Potter and the Deadly Hallows on learning of Harrys apparent death.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: McGonagall

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Harry Potter and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, actor, fairies. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Which of these cast members of the 2009 movie Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince was born in Paris, France?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Emma Watson

questions.question: What popular personality did actor Daniel Radcliffe portray in his debut movie?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: David Copperfield

questions.question: What kind of character did actor Rupert Grint from the 2009 Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince depict in a play based on the story of Noahs Ark when he was little?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A fish

questions.question: Who turns out to be the Half-Blood Prince in the sixth Harry Potter movie Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Severus Snape

questions.question: Why did actress Emma Watson, who plays Hermione in the Harry Potter series, keep her role in the sixth movie, Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince 2009, after initially deciding to quit?

options.text: She joked that she stayed because she was in love with Rupert Grint.
Her parents talked her into staying.
She did it for the fans.
She couldnt bear to see anyone else play Hermione.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: She couldnt bear to see anyone else play Hermione.

questions.question: After Maleficent dies in the film Sleeping Beauty, Prince Phillip rushes to Aurora and removes the curse with a kiss. The two enter the palaces ballroom and see Auroras parents. Is this the first time Aurora has seen her parents since she was an infant?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: This actress reportedly accepted the role of Narcissa Malfoy for the 2009 movie Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince, but her agent stated that the rumors were not true.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Naomi Watts

questions.question: With whom does Harry Potter form a relationship in the 2009 movie Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ginny Weasley

questions.question: What is the nickname of Sirius Black, whose younger brother Regulus Black appears in a photograph owned by Horace Slughorn in the movie Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince 2009?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Padfoot

questions.question: How did actor Jim Broadbent describe his character, Horace Slughorn, from the sixth Harry Potter movie, Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince 2009?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Comic character

questions.question: In the animated movie Sleeping Beauty, the fairies enter Maleficents castle and free the prince and give him these two magical objects.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A sword and a shield

questions.question: What kind of bird is the character from Oscar Wildes fairy tale The Happy Prince?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Swallow

questions.question: Sleeping Beauty was re-released theatrically in 1970, 1971, 1986, 1993, 1995, and 2008. How much did it gross in theatres in the period 1959-2009, when adjusted for ticket price inflation?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: $478.22 million

questions.question: In the animated film Sleeping Beauty, Aurora and Prince Phillip dance a waltz and do not notice the fairies magically changing the color of Auroras ball gown.  As the book closes, Auroras gown turns this color and remains this color.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pink

questions.question: What are the differences between the original plot of the book and the script of 2009 movie Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince?

options.text: Dumbledores funeral was not in the script.
Both the battle in the castle and Dumbledores funeral were not in the script.
The climactic battle in the castle was not in the script.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Both the battle in the castle and Dumbledores funeral were not in the script.

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Oscar Wildes and Blackstar
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, leader, hans. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What does the Soul want from the fisherman in Oscar Wildes fairy tale The Fisherman and his Soul?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: His heart

questions.question: How does the nightingale from Oscar Wildes story The Nightingale and the Rose find a red rose for the poor student?

options.text: It paints a white rose with its blood
It travels trough many countries and dies from exhaustion
It prays to God and He sends one

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It paints a white rose with its blood

questions.question: Who is the mother of the Star-Child from Oscar Wildes fairy tale The Star-Child?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A beggar

questions.question: What is the last line of the Infanta from Oscar Wildes story The Birthday of the Infanta?

options.text: Its a shame Ive forgotten who I was, so let the people decide my fate.
For the future, let those who come to play with me have no hearts.
Little people will never know what its like being a princess.
Justice shall reign one day when I sit on the throne.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: For the future, let those who come to play with me have no hearts.

questions.question: What happens to the beautiful garden of the giant when he builds a wall to keep children off in Oscar Wildes fairy tale The Selfish Giant?

options.text: There is no more sunshine in the garden, only darkness
The small pond dries up and the fish dies
All the flowers wither and the birds die
Eternal winter sets in the garden

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eternal winter sets in the garden

questions.question: Why does the shepherd from Oscar Wildes fairy tale The Young King refuse to wear the royal raiment?

options.text: He doesnt want to be a king
He has nightmares of where it came from

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He has nightmares of where it came from

questions.question: In the Blackstar animates series, which of these was not a name of the little people known as the Trobbits?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dargo

questions.question: Harry Potter, Voldemort, and Dumbledore have connected wands.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: What is the beautiful Star-Child transformed into in Oscar Wildes fairy tale The Star-Child?

options.text: A cross between a snake and a toad

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A cross between a snake and a toad

questions.question: In what year were the Blackstar animated series first broadcast on American television?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 1981

questions.question: How did Blackstar from the animated series of the same name get stranded in the alien world?

options.text: After an impact with an asteroid
After falling in a black hole

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: After falling in a black hole

questions.question: What does Hans from Oscar Wildes fairy tale The Devoted Friend do for a living?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hes a gardener

questions.question: What was the first name of the animated 1980s hero Blackstar?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: John

questions.question: Which of these fictional characters is the leader of the Death Eaters?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Voldemort

questions.question: Why does the rocket from Oscar Wildes story The Remarkable Rocket fail to ignite?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It gets wet

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Willows and Toad
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, toads, toad. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In the novel The Wind in the Willows, while Mr. Toad is in jail, this person becomes fond of him and helps him escape.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The jailers daughter

questions.question: Based on Mr. Toads car driving in The Wind in the Willows, Mr. Toads Wild Ride was established in 1955. What is it?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: a ride at Disneyland

questions.question: In The Wind in the Willows, Mr. Toad tries to hitchhike back to the River Bank community. What is the significance of the car and driver that give Toad a ride?

options.text: It is Toads car, and Badger is the driver
It is Rats car, and Badger is the driver
It is the same car that Toad stole earlier
It is an undercover police car

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is the same car that Toad stole earlier

questions.question: What character from The Wind in the Willows becomes easily obsessed with items, only to forget about them soon after acquiring them?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mr. Toad

questions.question: In 1949 Disney released their animated versions of The Wind in the Willows and this short story.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Legend of Sleepy Hollow

questions.question: In the book The Wind in the Willows, shortly after his escape and still in disguise, Mr. Toad meets a bargewoman and tricks her into giving him a job. The bargewoman discovers Toads trick and throws him overboard. He steals her horse and sells it to a Gypsy for what?

options.text: A ride back to Toad Hall
A place to spend the night

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Money and stew

questions.question: After his jail escape, The Wind in the Willows character, Toad, learns from Ratty that Toad Hall has been taken over by these Wild Wood animals.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: the weasels, stoats and ferrets

questions.question: How many episodes of the animated series Blackstar ran on American television?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: 13

questions.question: The Wind in the Willows was published in 1908 without much notice. What famous author and playwright, best known for Winnie the Pooh, adapted part of the book for the stage in 1929, thus making the book famous?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A. A. Milne

questions.question: What character from The Wind in the Willows gets lost in Wild Wood while looking for Badgers house?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mole

questions.question: In 1967 this British rock band released their first album. It was titled after Chapter 7 of The Wind in the Willows: The Piper at the Gates of Dawn.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pink Floyd

questions.question: In order to escape, Toad from The Wind in the Willows is dressed in disguise. What is he disguised as?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A washerwoman

questions.question: In the novel The Wind in the Willows, Toad has crashed 6 cars, been put in the hospital for injuries 3 times, and has spent a great deal of money on fines. Toads friends decide to do this to save Toad since he has no sense when it comes to his obsessions.

options.text: Make him live underground with Mole

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Put him under house arrest

questions.question: At the beginning of the book The Wind in the Willows, what is Mole doing when he gets angry and goes above ground to the river?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: spring cleaning

questions.question: The Wind in the Willows was first published in 1908. What Scottish-born writer and author of the story The Reluctant Dragon wrote this book?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kenneth Grahame

quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Peter and Shadow Thieves
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, kind, peters. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: In Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince, when Harry is visiting Weasleys Wizard Wheezes, what is the last product mentioned before he followed Draco Malfoy into Knockturn Alley?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Pygmy Puff

questions.question: Does Peter, the main character in Peter and the Shadow Thieves, wear shoes?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: Where does Peter live in the childrens novel Peter and the Shadow Thieves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mollusk Island

questions.question: In the childrens novel Peter and the Shadow Thieves, James and Thomas are the two fastest Lost boys.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: What is the name of the mermaid that flirts with Peter in the book Peter and the Shadow Thieves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Teacher

questions.question: What kind of tree does Harry Potter sit under after Dumbledores funeral?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Beech

questions.question: The first time Harry Potter encounters a little girl outside the room of requirement, she drops a bottle of what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Toadspawn

questions.question: What is Bellatrix Lestranges wand made of?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Walnut

questions.question: How does Peter get to London in the book Peter and the Shadow Thieves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He goes by boat.

questions.question: What is Zoeys last name on the TV show Zoey 101?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Brooks

questions.question: In the novel Peter and the Shadow Thieves, Slank is one of the Aster guards.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: False

questions.question: Who does Peter have to warn about Ombra in the childrens novel Peter and the Shadow Thieves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Molly

questions.question: In the book Peter and the Shadow Thieves, the starstuff was in what tower?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: White Tower

questions.question: In Peter and the Shadow Thieves, what is the name of Fighting Prawns oldest daughter?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shining Pearl

questions.question: Which fairy is Peters guardian in the book Peter and the Shadow Thieves?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tinker Bell
